Name: Swamp Water
Ingredients: 40 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge and mint sprigs.
Garnish with lime wedge and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: Reverential herbal Chartreuse turned tropical and fruity by pineapple and lime.
History: Emerged during the 1970s and features in cocktail books of the period from Brian F. Rea's 1976 Brian's Booze Guide onwards.
Nutrition: One serving of Swamp Water contains 196 calories
